octavia_load_balancer_create_l7_policy_p: The position of this L7 policy. Positions start at 1.
octavia_load_balancer_create_l7_policy_a: Redirection URL: Requests for this L7 Policy will be redirected to this URL. Only valid if the action is REDIRECT_TO_URL
The request is transferred to the primary pool associated with the L7 policies

The load balancer returns the “redirect http” code along with the redirection URL via the “location” header: the URL received in the request, prefixing the value of the “redirect prefix” field with it
octavia_load_balancer_create_l7_policy_h: Requests that match this policy will be redirected with this HTTP return code. The return code value is 302
